comment.author: 92583649@N04
comment._content: Actually I think this is Barrack Street.

comment.author: 92558352@N05
comment._content: going by the orientation of the perth town hall, i would say that this is taken from what is now the hay st mall, looking east. barrack st would be running from left to right in front of the town hall. heritageperth.com.au/files/2009/05/perth-town-hall.jpg

comment.author: 69746795@N05
comment._content: Definitely got to be Hay Street. Was it called Flag Street at one time?

comment.author: 92584555@N07
comment._content: Hay St, heading towards Barrack. The little girl is standing near where St Martins Arcade is now.

comment.author: 92586299@N05
comment._content:
I think this name has simply been read from old faded handwriting and misread as Flag when it should be Hay. 
Looking at the two names together we can see how easily that could happen.   Hay read as Flag.   
H  read as         Fl  
a  is right        a 
y  easily read as  g

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: I have updated the description for this image and the others on Hay Street. Many thanks for your comments and feedback.
